name: aws-agent
description: An intelligent AI-powered system that provides real-time user behavior analysis, predictive analytics, and automated interventions for mobile and web applications.

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && sleep 1 && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:user-app" "npm run dev:analytics" --names "shared,user-app,analytics" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:shared && npm run build:dev --workspace=packages/user-app && npm run build:dev --workspace=packages/analytics-dashboard
scripts.build:staging: npm run build:shared && npm run build:staging --workspace=packages/user-app && npm run build:staging --workspace=packages/analytics-dashboard
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:shared && npm run build:prod --workspace=packages/user-app && npm run build:prod --workspace=packages/analytics-dashboard
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules
scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run test:ci
scripts.env:validate: npm run env:validate --workspace=packages/user-app && npm run env:validate --workspace=packages/analytics-dashboard
scripts.env:check: npm run env:check --workspace=packages/user-app && npm run env:check --workspace=packages/analytics-dashboard
scripts.env:setup: echo 'Setting up environment files...' && cp packages/user-app/.env.example packages/user-app/.env 2>/dev/null || true && cp packages/analytics-dashboard/.env.example packages/analytics-dashboard/.env 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'Environment files created. Please update with your actual values.'
